text:
April 8, 196k
Mr. B. L. Rosenthal
17 Bayard Lane
Suffera, Mew York
Dear Mr. Rosenthal:
Thank you for forwarding the commentaries to this office for the English
Through Poetry series which we are doing in cooperation with the Voice
of America.
It is our understanding that the last two commentaries were the final
ones for this series. As we have prevleosly paid you for the first eight
poems, we will process a check in the near future for final payment per
our agreement.
We appreciate the fine work you have done for us in realizing the
completion of this project. If we can ever he of service or assistance
to you in any way, please do not hesitate to call on us.
Sincerely,
James A. Fellows
Assistant Director
JAFssc
